originalText.text: What a great place! Caring and experienced doctors, appointments are on time and wait is very minimal. Knowledgeable staff and nurses. Recommend Dr. Grifo, Dr. Keefe, and Dr. Fino! All great doctors. I got a set of twins out of NYU Fertility Center :) Thank you so much to all the doctors and staff members!

text.text: What a great place! Caring and experienced doctors, appointments are on time and wait is very minimal. Knowledgeable staff and nurses. Recommend Dr. Grifo, Dr. Keefe, and Dr. Fino! All great doctors. I got a set of twins out of NYU Fertility Center :) Thank you so much to all the doctors and staff members!

originalText.text: I do not normally write reviews, but this one feels important to share as I recently went through my second of two egg retrievals with NYU Fertility. After a moderately successful—but not sufficient—first retrieval, I was encouraged by my doctor to pursue a second, as she was “confident we could achieve better results.” I was put on a more aggressive protocol, but the preliminary stages of the treatment plan were mismanaged and the results of the second round were drastically worse—on the order of about 50%. I am now being encouraged to undergo a third round, but am confused, disheartened, and disappointed by this experience, and have little confidence that the doctor and clinic are carefully managing and personalizing care plans to achieve the best results.

I am now being encouraged to undergo a third round, but am confused, disheartened, and disappointed by this experience, and have little confidence that the doctor and clinic are carefully managing and personalizing care plans to achieve the best results.

originalText.text: I have done two cycles of egg freezing at NYU Langone Fertility Center and it has exceeded all expectations, and then some! From the reception staff, to billing/insurance departments, nurses, patient coordinators, and doctors- every one was so warm, kind, informative, communicative, and displayed the utmost professionalism. Dr. Shannon Devore is amazing and the attention she gives to each patient makes it clear how much she truly cares and works tirelessly to get the best outcomes. I had consults at other “fertility centers” before starting the process and nothing was even close to my experience at NYU langone. Anyone seeking world-class fertility and reproductive planning- choose NYU!

originalText.text:
Shady billing with unhelpful staffs. My ivf coordinator Maribel has an attitude problem. When asked about my PA deny, her response was “so”? Well sorry to bother you about my 60 thousand dollar procedure on a Friday !

The billing office is even worse! They never called me back about my denied PA and refused to bill my insurance for an ultrasound. The office failed to tell me my insurance wasn’t par before I had the procedure done, and I still don’t even see a rejection from my insurance EOB forms. What a waste of time and money, I’m going back to my previous fertility clinic!

originalText.text: Dr. Devore and the entire NYU Langone staff is FANTASTIC!!! I couldn’t be happier with this fertility center and the wonderful employees. Dr. Devore takes her time to answer all my questions, made me feel comfortable along the way, is extremely knowledgeable, respectful, friendly and just overall a phenomenal Doctor. I couldn’t be more grateful for a wonderful experience with her and her team. Each nurse at NYU Langone Fertility was amazing from start to finish. The team took what would normally be a stressful process and made it as smooth and seamless as possible for my husband and I. I can’t say enough good things and I will be forever grateful for everyone that helped me throughout the process. A huge thank you to Dr. Devore and the NYU Langone Fertility Team, I hope you know how appreciative I am ♥️.
